sentences.sContent: ...the neo-Gothic buttresses of Riverside Church in Manhattan.
sentences.sCn: …曼哈顿的里弗赛德教堂中的新哥特式扶璧。

remMethod.val: but (仅仅) + tress (枝条) → 仅仅只有枝条支持 → 支持

trans.tranOther: a brick or stone structure built to support a wall
to support a system, idea, argument etc, especially by providing money
